cloudcontact_AI.md.integration_reasoning: API Key authentication for contact and SMS management

Create Contact.test_method: API 키 필요 - 연락처 생성 테스트 가능

Sent SMS Messages by Campaign.test_method: API 키 필요 - SMS 기록 조회 가능

Get Sent SMS Messages.test_method: API 키 필요 - SMS 기록 조회 가능

Search Contacts.test_method: API 키 필요 - 연락처 검색 테스트 가능

Create Post.test_method: API 키 필요 - 무료 플랜으로 테스트 가능 (최대 1,000 요청)

emailoctopus.md.integration_reasoning: EmailOctopus.com: Basic Auth with API Key

New Subscription Confirmations.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint. Use BeehiivWebhooks class with Flask server

New Subscriptions.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint. Example: python beehiiv_api.py webhook 8080

User Unsubscribes.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint with handler registered

New Post Sent.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint. Test by sending post to subscribers

New Subscription Upgrades.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint. Test by upgrading subscription

New Survey Responses.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint with webhook handler

New Subscription Downgrades.test_method: Requires public webhook endpoint. Test by downgrading subscription
